Proggy Clean (ProggyClean.ttf)
Author: Tristan Grimmer

This project embeds the Proggy Clean TrueType font as an inlined resource to
provide a default monospaced font. The original font is distributed by its
author free of charge. Please consult the upstream project and author for the
most current license terms and attribution requirements.

Upstream info:
- Proggy Fonts by Tristan Grimmer (historical project page)
- Also distributed with Dear ImGui in the misc/fonts folder for developer use

If you are the copyright holder and would like different attribution or
distribution terms applied in this repository, please open an issue.
